Reviews.Title: Great LCD for the money!!!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lightner "dlightner007"
Reviews.Content: I reviewed LCD 26 and 32in TVs for weeks looking at specs and design and I finally decided on the LG350 for our master bedroom. So far I'm very pleased with my selection. It came down to the Samsung 26" C450 and this one. For the money and options the LG was a better pick for sure. I must say the sound is by far best on this TV than any other LCD I looked at. The TV turns on quickly (2-3sec) some delay much longer. The blacks are black and the colors look great, even on standard def channels. Some LCDs look horrible on SD channels but not this one. Very pleased with the menu setup and the remote control. The only thing I'll say I don't care for is the picture wizard setup. It's almost easier to just use the standard pre set picture settings and make only minor adjustments to fit your room. The stand swivels smoothly which the Sony and Samsung don't. I also like that it's not a glossy screen with lots of reflections. I see very little blur when viewing fast moving options. You see it, but not like some other 60Hz TVs. So if you are looking for a great LCD for under $380.00. I highly recommend this model. Oh, and don't let anyone tell you any different. If you are looking at 32" and below. 720p is just as good as any 1080p model in this size range.only way this TV could be anymore perfect is for it to have a built in Blue-ray or DVD player.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to our home
Reviews.Author: Vagabond
Reviews.Content: We delayed upgrading to HD to let the dust settle a little, and we didn't want to give up our current entertainment center, so finding something under 27" was imperative. This fit the bill for size and price. We have no previous experience with HD and had to upgrade to HD on DISH Network, too. Now that everything is operating, we are very pleased with this TV. We might want to fine tune color a bit after we're more familiar with the TV, but it is meeting our expectations and hopes and we've high-fived several times today. I ordered this on 5/21 and received it from Amazon on 5/25. Typical great service from Amazon. We had our stereo hooked up to the old TV because the sound wasn't great, but the speakers on the LG are clear and we'll probably not hook up the stereo to this one. We're still learning, but happy.Update: the matte finish of the screen is wonderful. I have reflections on the frame from my window blinds that cannot be seen on the picture. After watching it last night, we've decided the color settings are perfect -- no tweeking to be done. All wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Sue Bevine
Reviews.Content: After returning 3 HDTVs (Samsung, Sharp and Sanyo) I'm sooooo happy with this one.  A perfect picture and great sound.  I barely have to raise the sound to hear it, which is a problem with many other HDTVs.  There's no distortion of the images and the color is perfect.  I was almost going to buy a 22-inch model, but it looked small in the store, so I went for the 26-inch and I'm glad I did.  A good size if you're about 10' away from the set.  The on-screen menu is a little difficult to figure out  ... but once you get the hang of it ... it's ok.  A definate buy at a very good price.  Also, it's always good dealing with Amazon - trustworthy, efficient, competitive pricing and good quality products.

Reviews.Title: Problems after seven months
Reviews.Author: P. LI
Reviews.Content: I don't usually write review for the products I purchased, except when I experience problem with the particular product. I bought LG 26LD350 online at amazon in May 2010. It had excellent picture quality, good sound and amazing price. I bought it mainly for PS3 games. That was before.Lately, I have been experiencing problem with the LG 26LD350. In the past few days, after watching TV programs for about one hour or so, it shuts off by itself and would NOT turn back on. A red light keep flashing at lower right-hand corner. Then about 30min later, it turns back on by itself. I knew I should have bought Japanese brand when it comes to electronics, ie. Sony.I will be contacting LG customer service to get the TV fixed. Hopefully, it won't be much of a hassle. For sure I will update my comment later.Update 12/28/10:LG customer service told me to do something called "hard reset"; unplug the power cord, press and hold the power button for about 1 min, then turn TV back on. Well, so far so good. It has been a few days and it does not shut off on its own. I am not sure if this problem is fixed for good; fortunately the TV still under warranty.If any other people have experienced problem with LG TV, please share comments.

Reviews.Title: Clear voice setting wonderful for those hard of hearing
Reviews.Author: Marina Moonlight
Reviews.Content: So many helpful and comprehensive reviews have already been given for this wonderful TV, so I will keep my comments to those things which aren't often stressed.For me, the Clear Voice audio option has made it so that I can actually hear voices clearly, and not have to use closed captioning and subtitles. At first, I didn't realize that there are actually different levels that you can set the Clear Voice to. When I set it to the highest level, it was a revelation. You can also keep the Clear Voice on, and at the same time have it set to Music, Cinema, etc. And the power for the speakers is 14 watts, which is higher than most TV's of this size, making the audio quality even more impressive. It also has a feature which limits the sound of commercials relatively equal to that of the programming, another terrific feature.The four holes for attaching the stand to the TV are deeply recessed, so when setting up the TV, have a screwdriver with at least a 4" handle ready, preferably with a magnetized tip. Do not screw the screws in too tightly. The heads of the screws are soft, and strip easily if you need to unscrew them.The one serious drawback to this TV is that it is an energy hog if you leave it on standby after you have shut it off. The bright red light that remains on must use at least 20 watts. The solution is to put the TV on a power strip, and turn off the strip after you've turned the TV off. You will not lose your settings. The reason the TV did not receive an Energy Star rating is because of the high "vampire load" it carries when it's turned off. If you use a power strip to turn it completely off, it's actually more efficient than most TV's because you can use energy savings settings, including a no picture option when you are just listening to music. Please be kind to our planet (and your wallet) and use a power strip.26" is a completely adequate size for a bedroom (mine is 12' x 14') and makes it easier to set up and haul around, a good choice if you're not very strong. As has already been stated, at this size 1080 pixels will not really improve the quality of the picture, and may actually cause increased trailing.The only other comments have been already stated by others- picture and sound blows away the competition, at an excellent price (a steal at $300 through Amazon.)

Reviews.Title: Solid price for a great buy.
Reviews.Author: Lordzz
Reviews.Content: Understand that I'm the kind of person to be very particular about the brands of electronics I buy. LG is a relatively newer company, but their electronics' quality is certainly no lesser than Samsung or even Sony. The size is actually a lot larger than one would think, in the store sitting next to a buncha 30'',40'',50'',and 50''+ televisions the puny 26er doesn't seem to big. But once in my home, it's stunning what the size of the TV actually is. Perfect for any room, viewing distance can be from over 10'. The 2 HDMI ports is a huge plus too.I would recommend this tv to anyone in the market for a practical and affordable home entertainment device.

Reviews.Title: Nobody reads the titles
Reviews.Author: PMurph "Too Tall Jones"
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a great TV. I purchased this particular TV to mount up in the exercise room, so I only use it for an hour a day. The only negative that I have with this TV is that the speakers are mounted in the back of the body. This make the sound awkward as it has to bounce off the wall and around to the front. I hooked it up to surround sound to get over that issue.Great TV for what it's being used for.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Jessica Litwin "rowan_debeauchamp"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom when Amazon was selling it for $319 and am glad I did, as the price has increased by about $20.  I already had an LG BluRay player and wanted to purchase an LG TV for the convenience of being able to use one remote for both devices. The TV was very easy to set up and the remote is comfortable to hold and simple to operate.  The colors on the TV are extremely sharp. Sound quality is exceptional and I rarely go above 10 or 12 for movies. I didn't care for the feature that is supposed to keep speaking voices at a level louder than the background noise. I would rather listen to the movie as the director intended, so I only use the TV's default sound settings. I also like the swivel base on the TV.  I have hooked my TV directly to the cable line and the regular cable comes in perfectly. I already had a cable box/DVR in the living room with a bigger TV and didn't see the need to rent another box. However, I have been really impressed with the quality of the images from regular cable.  It is also a snap to hook up to a laptop computer to watch movies streaming from Hulu, Netflix, Amazon, iTunes, or any other site. Other than wishing the TV was priced in the $250 range, I have absolutely no complaints. I did think the price was high compared to Visio and Sanyo, but I have been so satisfied with the quality, that I believe the extra money was worth it.

Reviews.Title: great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Shari Irving
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my bedroom and really like it. I'm only using it to watch regular TV which is in broadcast in 720p, and don't watch any action or sports. The picture is really good as well as the sound. I would recommend it to anyone looking to buy a bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Great second tv
Reviews.Author: shaman "Bev"
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv.  we use it in our master bedroom.  Has all the features I wanted.  We have dropped cable tv except for basic cable. I use my computer to connect the tv to my netflix account.  I watch movies and netfilx content when I want and the reception is great.  It is so easy to connect and the color and clarity are great.

Reviews.Title: First HDTV purchase and I Love it!
Reviews.Author: Dustin
Reviews.Content: This is my first time buying a TV ever. I went with LG because of the brand recognition. This TV is in my bedroom which makes the 26" a great size, no need for the 32". The color and sound are both great whether I'm using my DVD player, DirecTV, or streaming Netflix through my laptop. I've had it for about a month now and it's still working great. The menu also has a lot of neat features. I definitely recommend this unit. Oh, and PS: I don't have any HD services so I can't comment on that, but regular digital looks great!

Reviews.Title: very pleased
Reviews.Author: EB
Reviews.Content: Just set up this 26" TV in my living room replacing a 19".  You might not think 26" is big, but compared to the 19" it's much bigger and just right for us.  Without yet making any adjustment for type of picture or sound, it works just fine.  Picture and sound are great.  We don't have cable and use an antenna and hook it up through the old VCR.One hint if this happens to anyone else:  When attaching the base we found that the top of the cylindrical protrusion from the base was "twisted" so the arrows didn't point in the right direction.  I almost had them send me another base but figured out that I could pry up the cap on this cylindrical protrusion, loosen three screws underneath, twist it in the proper direction, retighten the screws, replace the cap.  Very easy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Banjos and Duct Tape
Reviews.Content: There aren't a lot of choices in 26" TVs, so finding one that was reasonably priced (on a special deal from Amazon) and does this good a job was doubly impressive.What's to like? Great picture, easy to operate controls, terrific sound (it's better with the HDMI cable, still OK with analog audio connections). Also, it looks good, with a relatively small bezel -- some TVs have too much surrounding the screen.Both HD and SD content looks great using HDMI or component connections. I thought the image was a little soft when using the composite video input, and I couldn't get the colors adjusted the way I prefer. I didn't try using the coax input, because the FIOS DVR doesn't have that option. But there are enough adjustments for my needs using HDMI or component video (I'm using component to connect to the DVR -- it connects faster than HDMI, because there is a short communication lag -- didn't bother me, but annoyed my better half).Really, the only flaw so far has been the set-up instructions. Instead of a colorful, one page "Start Here" poster or flyer, as I've seen with Vizio and Panasonic TVs, the LG comes with more complicated instructions. Not a huge deal, but considering this is a top tier product, I expected a friendlier package. But if that's the only negative, I'm happy. More important, my wife is happy.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: 610madison
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a small bedroom and it is perfect.  Fantastic picture.  I especially like the swivel base.  The quality to price ratio is high.  I don't think you can go wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: Most excellent for the money
Reviews.Author: S. Miller "SuzieQ2"
Reviews.Content: Did not want to spend much.  Did not have much space, as this tv was going in a corner attached to the wall with a cheetah bracket.  Doors on both sides of the tv I had to be careful in choosing size. This is for use while on the treadmill approx 6-7 feet from  the tv in the sun room.  The picture is most excellent and the first channel I tuned on had snowboarding.  So there was action and my LG tv picture was awesome for as I watching the snowboarders, my heart was in my throat...So in my opinion, it is quite fine to watch that kind of action.  The weight is easy to handle when holding in place while attaching the wall bracket and yes best to have help when putting on wall.  I just wish I could crank up the volume to over ride the treadmill, but then I guess that is really not the problem of the tv.  This is my second LG the other being for the bedroom and is a 32 inch.  I am very pleased with my LG Televisions.  If you place this 26 inch tv on a dresser in my opinion it will be very steady on its stand (which is supplied) as long as you do not have it in the reach of little ones.  My bedroom LG sits just fine on the dresser, although for both size tvs you do have the option of attaching it with screws (supplied) through the dresser top for extra support...but that i found very unnecessary.The Cheetah mount for the 26inch tv was very easy to install and this is the one I choose Cheetah Mounts 23"-37" LCD TV Wall Mount Bracket with Full Motion Swing Out Tilt & Swivel Articulating Arm for VESA 200 100 Flat Screen Flat Panel LED Plasma TV and Monitor Displays.  This mount is Very Sturdy and allows the tv to be angled in the corner.  All in all this tv is a most excellent price and if you r using for any room and do not need the bells ans whistles that the bigger tvs have, then I think u will be as pleased as me.

Reviews.Title: Best LCD in this size
Reviews.Author: pavlovsdog00
Reviews.Content: Great colors, good viewing angle (I'm used to plasmas excellent viewing angles, but this one is good for an LCD), and the best sound you're going to find in a TV this size (More of a statement about how horrible the sound is on other small TVs then a compliment of this TV's sound).The only knock I can think of for this TV is that you can get the 32 inch for just a few more bucks, which is obviously worth it.  I hung this TV between my master bedroom closet and Master bathroom, though, and all I had to work with was exactly 26 inches.Don't be turned off by 720p vs. 1080p.  At this screen size you won't be able to notice the difference!

Reviews.Title: Skip the cheap brands
Reviews.Author: Tampa8 "Tampa8"
Reviews.Content: Yes, the LG is more expensive than some other cheap brands. While I would not pay the suggested price, the Amazon price makes this a terrific buy. You get one of the best pictures from any maker. You get a built in easy to use adjustment system that approaches what an expert calibrator can do. You also get a solid stand, (if you're not wall mounting) unlike the junk that I have seen and read about for some cheap models. The sound is way above average for a TV of this size, no problem with volume, you won't come anywhere near turning it all the way up, again unlike what I am reading in other TV's reviews. The "Clear Voice" feature really works, it makes the dialog really stand out if you have some problem hearing. While turning up the base only adds a little, the sound is not tinny, certainly not like many small TVs. It has several aspect choices, and several inputs. (TV ant, two HDMI, one Component, one Composite, one Computer) I have had a 46" LG of a very similar model for about a year and half and it has performed perfectly. They both have a contrast setting that when combined with other settings correctly makes the picture stand out like almost no other TV, yet look realistic. It has some type of a matt finish on the screen as does my bigger model, that really does a good job of diminishing reflections and supposedly adding depth to the picture.I can not think of a downside for this TV. This is a case of you will get what you pay for, those cheap brands are not in the same league, do yourself a favor and try this set.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: 2cent
Reviews.Content: This TV is satisfactory, especially for the money. The picture is clear. The remote is easy to use. The only negative is that the color is more to the blue side. Reds are not very red. I have made every adjustment possible, and it is still too blue. But I decided to live with it anyway rather than send it back.

Reviews.Title: Pre-purchase Info...
Reviews.Author: J. Jacobs "Jay J"
Reviews.Content: Well, real quick, I've had the TV for a month and it's been doing just fine.  Speakers are on the bottom.  No problem.  Controls/Remote are easy to use.  It's a good value for the price I paid - $269.I accidentally stopped in Best Buy and saw the TV was on sale for $299, not $429 I've been seeing on their website for MONTHS!  I called BB and they seemed to have fixed that, for this TV in the least.  They told me it has to do with nationwide pricing.  Funny, .... the next day, the on-line price was $299!  Sooo, for future reference, check the box store AS WELL AS the website for pricing.  You never know.  And 3 days later, the BB price dropped to $269 and they gave me the additional $30 savings since the price drop was within 30 days!Also, read the Return Policy fine print of the on-line retailer BEFORE you buy from them.  In almost EVERY case, the on-line retailers don't take returns on TVs over 20", or whatever!  And even if you can return a TV, you get a store credit.  PLUS, the TV (in its original box) has to be sent back in its OWN box to protect the original box, I guess.  So, beware.  TVs from sold by Amazon.com, directly, (not a 3rd party retailer) follow their own Return Policy.  Again, learn before you buy...

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: The J. Man
Reviews.Content: This was my first hdtv and I am not one bit disappointed.  The picture quality is awesome.  Playing PS3 on this is so much better than a standard def tv its not even funny.  Sound is actually really good for built in speakers, although I haven't really tried to see how loud they will go, normally it doesn't go above 13 here in my bedroom and is still plenty loud for games and movies.  I haven't watched any blu-rays on it but the normal dvds upconverted by my ps3 look just as great as the video games do.

Reviews.Title: LG 26 LD 350 26-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD Tv
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Took it out of the box set it up like the instuctions. Put the cable in, plugged it in and it started up and was automatic. Did a few changes and sat down to watch tv. Good picture. Changed the sound setting so my 80 year old mother could hear better. It helped clear out the loud back ground noise. Don't know why they have to make that so loud where you can't hear what is being said.

Reviews.Title: new lcd 26'
Reviews.Author: amazonite
Reviews.Content: had a several years old 13' tv/vcr combo in my bedroom , was looking to go larger. saw this good reviews, great price , black fri. deal. picture is great, very easy to use overall. highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: LG are really nice TVs, at an affordable price.
Reviews.Author: Alex Gough
Reviews.Content: I bought this a couple of months ago, before LG was making the LED 26". So of course I would have bought the LED instead of this one, but that's besides the point. Anyway, this TV is awesome for the price. The user interface for the menus are great and useful, the remote is full featured, the TV itself is quite sexy as well. The aluminum strip on the bottom of it looks really great, and the blue LED power light is really cool too. The LCD display looks good for sure, definite clear 720p at its best. The TV's inputs should be sufficient for nearly any bedroom. This TV has everything you need! Also, compared to its other non-led competitors, this TV has a nice slim form factor.

Reviews.Title: 26LD350 Great Sound!
Reviews.Author: TECHDADDY "TECHDADDY"
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a 26" flat screen for a while.  This is the perfect size TV for most bedroom installations.  The picture quality is great and the LG software is a nice touch.  What sets this TV apart from all the others on the market is the sound quality.  This TV has two 7 watt speakers located on the bottom and the LG clear voice technology gives you an unbelievable sound from such a small set. To my knowledge there is no other 26" that has the sound quality or 7 watt power output of this TV. This TV also has a 5 ms response time that gives a nice video experience. When I made this purchase $319 from another online retailer was the best price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!!
Reviews.Author: M. Harris
Reviews.Content: This is an updated review. I decided instead of updates to do the whole thing over again. This is an excellent T.V. I love it. I will describe in detail what I love about this tv.The SoundThe sound is very good for a flatscreen T.V. It has a nice solid sound, not tinny at all. There is plenty of volume, especially once you use the Clear Voice feature. It makes every sound louder, not just the voices. Once I turned it on, I had to turn it down, way down. I bought this T.V. is particular because of the fact that it had thick speakers. In the early mornings and later in the night, I keep the sound low. In the middle of the day when there is more action, I have to turn it up more, but not past 15. For some shows that I really get into, I turn it up to 20 (out of 100) So there is no problem with that. Obviously you will not get Bose quality sound, but it's not at a Bose quality price. The sound is just as good as older T.Vs. I had a Vizio that I sold back, and that had great sound, but this is just as good. This has better volume control, no uneven changes of volume when going from 1 number to the next.The PictureI have fallen in love with the picture, it being the 5th day of ownership. With my former T.V., the Vizio, the picture was why sent it back. Sorry to say this, but it sucked! The tv had to warm up for 5 minutes, not in this day and age will I allow that. For the first 5 minutes, there were waves coming from the center of the screen that were too obvious to overlook. I would be embarrased to have a guest over and them see this. But, this LG tv doesn't do that. It is ready to go from the start. There are plenty of picture settings, so that you can fine tune it to your taste. With the Vizio, there was always a reddish hue in the screen. I could never get the settings the way I wanted them. With this, only simple adjusting was needed. The blacks are black, the reds are red, the blues are blue, etc. Everything looks really good. I have no HD device, so I can't say how that is, but standard def is amazing. I have never seen such a great picture with my other TV, or the two before that one. They had lines in the picture, with this one you can hardly see them even up close. The viewing angle is great, which is exactly what I wanted. I have yet to try a DVD, but my playsation is great and I'm sure the DVD will be breathtaking. Don't be discouraged by this being a 720p, it is just as good a 1080, and I would never complain about it.OtherThe apperance of this television is great. I love the fact that it has a swivel stand, that is a nice feature. The cleaning cloth it comes with is great, it works exclellently. All TVS should come with one. I'm glad this did, because the Vizio I sent away also had one. So I have made no compromises with this one. The full manual is not printed, it is on a CD, which is fine. The T.V. is easy to figure out anyway. The remote is nice, I love the Q. Menu, which give you quick access to sleep timer, aspect ratio, picture mode, etc. The remote is sturdy and is much easier to put batteries in than the Vizio. I'm not knocking Vizio, just the TV they idiotically produced. Also, the remote sensor on this TV is better than the Vizio. The Vizio had a delay and you had to point the remote directly at the sensor. With this, I could point it in the opposite direction and it still works.So, I would recommend this to anyone who wants a quality TV, for a great price, especially at Walmart where I got mine. This is best suited for bedrooms, but surely can be used for some living rooms, kitchens and such. This was my first LG product ever, and will not be my last.UPDATEAbout a month after it came. I love this TV so much. Everything about it is so great. I have watched many TV shows. I love the cleaning cloth, it's so effective. This TV is far better than anything else I've had, and maybe most other TVs of this size.

Reviews.Title: TV works well
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Vaughan
Reviews.Content: I am pleased to report that the inexpensive LG TV I purchase was promptly delivered, easy to install and exactly as described. The picture is acceptable, but not as clear and bright as other more expensive ones we own.

Reviews.Title: LG 26 inch TV
Reviews.Author: GNash
Reviews.Content: I would have given this model a "five star" rating, but I only have it connected to cable through the basic cable connector and am not subscribing to HD service so I can't judge it for that service.No issues with picture at all, performs great.  Highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: LG TV
Reviews.Author: pops 123
Reviews.Content: The LG TV worked out good for our bedroom. I had a 20 inch Sharp and this was a good upgrade in picture size. The picture clarity and sound are good. I don't have cable HD hooked to this one but the picture is still very good quality. Overall I am pleased with the TV and the price that I paid. I also have an LG washer and dryer that were pleased with. I will probably continue to buy LG products when needed.

Reviews.Title: Very good value
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Purchased this set for family member, as a gift. They have been using it for over six months now, at least four hours a day. So far, great picture and great sound on all the cable HD channels.... the non-HD channels, picture is ok.Setup took a bit longer than it did with my Vizio flat screens. Instruction book was easy to follow.This is a good flat screen for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Susan Moeller
Reviews.Content: Nice picture, easy setup.  Make sure to use quality USB cables for optimal viewing.  Amazon has high speed ones for $10 - no need to spend $50+ at retail stores...

Reviews.Title: Great for small bedroom
Reviews.Author: BIGGEN
Reviews.Content: This is a great television for a small bedroom.  I have my PS3 hooked up to it and it looks amazing.  A very good looking tv, and very well made.  It doesn't feel cheap at all.  Also, a very nice remote.  If you're thinking about buying this tv for a living room, I'd go with the 32 inch, but for a bedroom this works perfectly.  I'd highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Pleased with TV
Reviews.Author: P. Iannicari "LeoGirl"
Reviews.Content: Received the TV in a very timely manner.  The picture is great.  Have it mounted in the bedroom.  Just the right size.

Reviews.Title: Love LG TVs
Reviews.Author: texas critter
Reviews.Content: I have three LG TVs, all work great, this one is in the kitchen, also hooked up to a Mac Mini with a camera over the backyard for security monitoring.

Reviews.Title: DEAD AFTER ABOUT 300 HOURS OF USE
Reviews.Author: victor schiraga
Reviews.Content: Being that it's installed in a smallish motor home it's not used much. About 15 months after getting it suddenly it shuts OFF and would, after a various periods of time come on for a few minutes then shut off. Perhaps a new beta feature?

Reviews.Title: Quick delivery and reliable item
Reviews.Author: Dr. V
Reviews.Content: I've had this LG for over a year and have had no trouble.  When I purchased this item it was fairly expensive compared to other brands but I feel LG is well worth it.  I'd compare it to the Apple of TV's; without the smugness.  (Well, maybe a little)  I would recommend this product because it's worked very well and has a very user-friendly handle to it.  It's not very large but consumerism doesn't have to become a religion in America.

Reviews.Title: Completely stopped working at 1 year, 5 months.
Reviews.Author: Just a dude
Reviews.Content: Five months out of warranty, it completely died.  Refuses to turn on.  Nothing "happened" to it.  Turned it off one night, the next day it was dead.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV w/ Excellent Viewing Angles!
Reviews.Author: Dale
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LG 26LD350 after months of research for a bedroom TV.  I was going to go with a slightly cheaper brand/model, but found that some of those had terrible viewing angles, which is a huge factor for a bedroom TV that will most likely be up higher or off center.  That is not the case with this TV.  It remains crystal clear from whatever angle you throw at it!PROS:  Clean look and simplistic design.  Wide viewing angles.  Sound quality.  Remote.CONS:  For it's use as a bedroom TV...noneI've had the TV for a year now, and no complaints.  It exceeded expectations as a bedroom TV.  For general channel flipping and the occasional DVD/Blu-Ray, it's perfect!LG makes a fine product that I have recommended to many and will continue to recommend.  I've lead friends and family to the purchase of a 42" and two 55" LG TV's since buying this one.  I highly recommend the LG 26LD350!8/15/12 UPDATE:We've had this TV since December 2010 and it's still perfect for our needs.  It's excellent for channel surfing or the occasional movie.  No doubt, a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tv
Reviews.Author: Roberto J. Rincon V
Reviews.Content: Its a great TV excellent sound and image quality... ps3 games look awesome on it. The instruction manual wasnt very good but its understandable. The stand installation is a bit weird and you might have to do it twice for it to be in perfect position but that wont take more than 15mins.I connected it to the PC and looks great just remember to set the same resolution for that screen in your PC and in the tv video options menu (1300somethingx768). The PC recognized it imediatly no problems at all, if you're on xp you might have to restart for both screens to work (your monitor and the tv)Good Tv excellent image and sound quality... 5/5 stars if you need a tv for your small to medium size bedroom this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Excelente tv, buen precio
Reviews.Author: J. E. RIVAS "josepe ~(o_o_)~"
Reviews.Content: Es muy completo, talvez el unico problema es que no tiene salidas de audio para llevarse el sonido a un amplificador. Como los antiguos tv de CRT, éste LCD tiene sonido muy pobre.La calidad de imagen es muy buena, los menús son intuitivos, supongo que es eficiente en consumo de corriente.Si lo va a comprar, no debe faltar un cable HDMI para conectar a la pc.Con par de cables RCA puede conectarle el dvd player.

Reviews.Title: Expensive 26" LG flatscreen HGTV
Reviews.Author: Fred R. Hermann
Reviews.Content: Nice unit but paid too much for it's size . Had a size constraint due to location. Amazon delivered what I ordered though. Great service but to expensive for 26" TV.

Reviews.Title: Good picture bad sound
Reviews.Author: Arthur B. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: This LG 26inch 720p television has a good picture. The sound quality however is poor especially since there are know rca outputs for external speakers.  The speakers hum and vibrate at less then 50% volume which could be corrected if there were outputs for speakers. You can have the best picture ever but if sound quality is poor it just becomes an average TV hence three stars.

Reviews.Title: lg-lcd tv
Reviews.Author: hamada
Reviews.Content: -i give 3 stars for this tv,for future i will getting 1080,not 720the pitcure for 1080 it is much better...than 720,also you can order same tvfrom wallmart for same price or under...

Reviews.Title: nice picture, cheap unstable table stand
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: TV is easy electronic setup and has a good quality picture, clearly a 3 out of 5. The directions for setup of the stand are terrible and incomplete. The swivel stand is not very stable and plastic and it would not standup to much handling, in fact ours broke 4 months in. Tech support was unhelpful, they did not even have the correct diagrams, and she did not know the parts. Horrible service. I think they shipped it missing screws. I had to reengineer the stand, parts from Home Depot, so it now is more stable, but the stand is still plastic.

Reviews.Title: Go with Sony
Reviews.Author: Neil Scott "Selective buyer"
Reviews.Content: Sony didn't have a TV in this size.  My wife was insistant to get a TV this size.  I should have stuck to my guns and purchased a Sony in the sizes available.  I'll never make this mistake again!

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This TV
Reviews.Author: Village
Reviews.Content: After about a month, the TV starting giving off a burning smell than burns the ears, eyes, nose, and throat. I have to return the TV because it is so toxic it is contaminating the air in my house. Because the problem didn't start until I had had the TV for a month or so, I can only get a partial refund. There is something wrong with this TV.

Reviews.Title: LG = Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: Roger Dixon
Reviews.Content: I purchased two LG televisions. Within a month one had to be shipped to LG for service for vibrating speakers. Not long after, the 52 inch had to be serviced due to poor picture and over heating. Then the smaller one needed a new remote sensor. Soon after the remote sensor in the 52" went out and was fixed. Now both remote sensors have gone out again and even with an extended warranty purchased through LG, they will not cover any more repairs because the cost of repairing exceeds the TV value, but they won't replace the TV either. I wrote to the CEO of LG USA nearly a month ago. Still no reply. I would guess LG has a bunch of bad remote sensors out there. I am now filing a complaint with my state consumer affairs department.
